S.FORM: Mark Aguirre 10 bulad 12 demiad, 1959 a mihca, Mark Aguirre, miunduay. Mark Aguirre nalecuhan i Chicago, Illinois, nanu syubay kanas mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, u adidi'ay ayaway mimaliay. Mark Aguirre i 1981 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ku uwac atu silsil 1, namapili' tu nu Dallas Mavericks putiput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan Lists of National Basketball Association players
